server_side

Class PictionaryServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • server_side.PictionaryServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, GameCommunication, ServerHandlerInterface

    public class PictionaryServer
extends Object
implements Runnable, GameCommunication, ServerHandlerInterface
    Server class that handles client connections, takes care of game progress. Server shut down when last user disconnect (check method removeHandler). Server is run on default user address:localhost on 25000 port. This server class only accepts connections with clients, handling connections is moved to private ClientHandler class.

      • sendGameInfo

        public void sendGameInfo(String username,
                         String gameInfo)
                  throws PictionaryException,
                         IOException
        Send game info/stage game info. This method is used by game class to inform client about game status, new stage etc.
        Specified by:
        sendGameInfo in interface GameCommunication
        Parameters:
        username - username of player to send message
        gameInfo - game information
        Throws:
        PictionaryException - the pictionary exception thrown when parsing message goes wrong
        IOException - if socket is closed IOException is thrown
